title: SOLD: Polar Bear Cobb (red) MC name on top
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: SOLD: Polar Bear Cobb (red) MC name on top
posts.post_content:
$xx delivered. (Wow, that was quick. My fastest sale ever.)

Shipping within United States only.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment. Checks, money orders and cash are OK, too.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/pb-cobb.jpg[/IMG]
Great card. It lasted two minutes. Wow.

What a nice card.  Great color.

Nice scanner too Rob.  What kind is it?

Happy Holidays.

Rob

Thanks, Rob.

Scanner is a Cannon all-in-one, MG 8220. I've been pretty happy with it.
